Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lafayette/91st
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 87th, King Drive and 95th: due to, street blockage near Lafayette/91st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 87th, King Drive and 95th: due to, street blockage near Lafayette/91st.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains bypassing Western
ShortDescription: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running, but not stopping at Western due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running, but not stopping at Western due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
